ISSUE.TITLE: Add option to add database and server url in CLI
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### I'm submitting a - [ ] bug report. - [x] feature request. ### Current Behaviour: <!-- Describe about the bug --> If we want to use a database file instead of using sqlite in memory database we can not give it as database url through cli. ### Expected Behaviour: <!-- Describe what will happen if bug is removed --> User will be able to give database and server url as argument in hydrus CLI ### Steps to reproduce: <!-- If you can then please provide the steps to reproduce the bug --> ### Do you want to work on this issue? <!-- yes/no --> Yes

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #155 from IamRaviTejaG/develop README.md: Updated usage instructions

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add CLI option to add database and server url Closes https://github.com/HTTP-APIs/hydrus/issues/160
